articles.author: Antonio Pequeño IV
articles.title: Crypto.com Arena Keeping Controversial Name Despite Exchange Shut Down - Forbes
articles.description: Crypto.com announced Friday its institutional exchange service for U.S. customers would cease operations, giving way to reports the cryptocurrency exchange could lose naming rights to the storied downtown Los Angeles arena formerly known as the Staples Center.
articles.content: The naming rights for Crypto.com Arena in downtown Los Angeles will not be impacted by the close of Crypto.coms institutional exchange service, according to the companydespite speculation the exchang… [+1926 chars]

articles.author: Sergiu Gatlan
articles.title: New MOVEit Transfer critical flaws found after security audit, patch now - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Progress Software warned customers today of newly found critical SQL injection vulnerabilities in its MOVEit Transfer managed file transfer (MFT) solution that can let attackers steal information from customers' databases.
